content.html: This is an example of the fragility of men. Women must dress “modestly” as not to arouse men during serious study. We tell girls their bodies should be covered & don’t teach boys 2B better. Obviously we need *some* boundaries but the onus of dress codes shouldn’t be on girls
content.value:
This is an example of the fragility of men. Women must dress “modestly” as not to arouse men during serious study. 

We tell girls their bodies should be covered & don’t teach boys 2B better. 

Obviously we need *some* boundaries but the onus of dress codes shouldn’t be on girls
